synopsis.text: Within the shadowy world of Contractors, a coveted chemical has been stolen, sparking intrigue and murder. When clues in the writing of author Otsuka point to the location of the substance, the notorious Contractor BK201, known as the Black Reaper, may be forced to silence him. Meanwhile, a buried stash tied to a dead Contractor is believed hidden beneath a cherry tree. Both a Contractor team lead by the enigmatic Hei as well as officers Misaki Kirihara and her squad set plans in motion to uncover the site during the festivities of the upcoming Cherry Blossom festival, setting up a fateful convergence. Contractors possess supernatural powers which they wield as deadly agents without allegiance. However, the Black Reaper stands apart for his unmatched lethality and mysterious motives. His participation in these interconnected events surrounding Otsuka and the chemical stash promise to unveil new revelations about Contractors and shatter existing rules of engagement. When killers with otherworldly powers clash, the only certainty is a rain of blood.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
